verses.verse: After<WG3326> these things,<WG5023> there was<WG2258> a feast<WG1859> of the Jews,<WG2453> and<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> went up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem.<WG2414>

for<WG1063> an angel<WG32> went down<WG2597> at certain<WG2596> times<WG2540> into<WG1722> the pool,<WG2861> and<WG2532> stirred<WG5015> up the water.<WG5204> Whoever<WG3588> stepped<WG3767> in first<WG4413> after<WG3326> the stirring<WG5016> of<WG3553> the water<WG5204> was made<WG1096> whole<WG5199> of<WG3553> <WG3739> whatever<WG1221> disease<WG3553> he had.<WG2722>

For<WG5124> this<WG3767> cause therefore<WG5124> the Jews<WG2453> sought<WG2212> all the more<WG3123> to kill<WG615> him,<WG846> because<WG3754> he<WG3089> not<WG3756> only<WG3440> broke<WG3089> the Sabbath,<WG4521> but<WG235> also<WG2532> called<WG3004> God<WG2316> his<WG2398> own Father,<WG3962> making<WG4160> himself<WG1438> equal<WG2470> with God.<WG2316>

Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> answered<WG611> them,<WG846> <WG2532> "Most<WG281> certainly,<WG281> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> the Son<WG5207> can<WG1410> do<WG4160> <WG3756> nothing<WG3762> of<WG575> himself,<WG1438> but<WG3361> what<WG5100> he sees<WG991> the Father<WG3962> doing.<WG4160> For<WG1063> whatever<WG302> things<WG3739><WG99999> he<WG1565> does,<WG4160> these<WG5023> the Son<WG5207> also<WG2532> does<WG4160> likewise.<WG3668>

For<WG1063> the Father<WG3962> judges<WG2919> no<WG3761> one,<WG3762> but<WG235> he has given<WG1325> all<WG3956> judgment<WG2920> to the Son,<WG5207>

that<WG2443> all<WG3956> may honor<WG5091> the Son,<WG5207> even as<WG2531> they honor<WG5091> the Father.<WG3962> He who doesn't<WG3361> honor<WG5091> the Son<WG5207> doesn't<WG3756> honor<WG5091> the Father<WG3962> who sent<WG3992> him.<WG846>

Don't<WG3361> marvel<WG2296> at this,<WG5124> for<WG3754> the hour<WG5610> comes,<WG2064> in<WG1722> which<WG3739> all<WG3956> that are<WG3588> in<WG1722> the tombs<WG3419> will hear<WG191> his<WG846> voice,<WG5456>

I<WG1473> can<WG1410> of<WG575> myself<WG1683> do<WG4160> <WG3756> nothing.<WG3762> As<WG2531> I hear,<WG191> I judge,<WG2919> and<WG2532> my<WG1699> judgment<WG2920> is<WG2076> righteous;<WG1342> because<WG3754> I don't<WG3756> seek<WG2212> my own<WG1699> will,<WG2307> but<WG235> the will<WG2307> of my Father<WG3962> who sent<WG3992> me.<WG3165>

The<WG2532> Father<WG3962> himself,<WG846> who sent<WG3992> me,<WG3165> has testified<WG3140> about<WG4012> me.<WG1700> You have<WG191> neither<WG3777> heard<WG191> his<WG846> voice<WG5456> at any time,<WG4455> nor<WG3777> seen<WG3708> his<WG846> form.<WG1491>
